document.docAuthor: Gheblealivand, Saeide S., Irani-Nejad, Karim Haddad, Magowski, Wojciech Ł. & Manzari, Shahab
document.masterDocTitle: The genus Tarsonemus Canestrini and Fanzago, 1876 (Acari: Heterostigmatina: Tarsonemidae) in East Azerbaijan, Iran, with a description of T. lenticulatus sp. nov. and re-description of T. annotatus Livshits, Mitrofanov and Sharonov, 1979

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Tarsonemus Canestrini and Fanzago, 1876 (Acari: Heterostigmatina: Tarsonemidae) in East Azerbaijan, Iran, with a description of T. lenticulatus sp. nov. and re-description of T. annotatus Livshits, Mitrofanov and Sharonov, 1979

bibRefCitation.refString: Suski, Z. W. (1969) Polish mites of the family Tarsonemidae (Acarina, Heterostigmata). II. Tarsonemus virgineus. Bulletin de l'Academie Polonaise des Sciences. CI. V, 17, 307 - 311.

Distribution: Palaearctic; probably Holarctic or cosmopolitan.
Remarks: This is the first record from Western Asia.
